statements: SELECT * FROM EconomicData ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT Date, UnemploymentRate FROM EconomicData WHERE GDP growth_rate > 2.5;
SELECT JobOpenings FROM EconomicData WHERE UnemploymentRate < 5.0 ORDER BY JobOpenings DESC;
SELECT Date, GDP growth_rate FROM EconomicData ORDER BY Date ASC, GDP growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM EconomicData WHERE JobOpenings > 100 ORDER BY GDP growth_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM EconomicData WHERE JobOpenings > 100 ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT Date, GDP growth_rate FROM EconomicData WHERE UnemploymentRate < 5 ORDER BY GDP growth_rate DESC;
SELECT Date, JobOpenings FROM EconomicData WHERE GDP growth_rate > 3 ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EconomicData WHERE UnemploymentRate >= 6 AND JobOpenings BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY UnemploymentRate ASC, JobOpenings DESC;
SELECT Date, UnemploymentRate, GDP growth_rate, JobOpenings FROM EconomicData ORDER BY GDP growth_rate ASC, Date DESC, JobOpenings ASC;
SELECT * FROM economic_data WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT unemployment_rate, gdp_growth_rate FROM economic_data WHERE unemployment_rate < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM economic_data WHERE gdp_growth_rate > 2.0 ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(unemployment_rate) AS max_unemployment_rate FROM economic_data;
SELECT decision_description, decision_date FROM policy_decisions ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT region_id, unemployment_rate, gdp_growth_rate FROM economic_data WHERE unemployment_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY gdp_growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_data WHERE gdp_growth_rate < 0.0;
SELECT decision_id, decision_description FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT region_id, unemployment_rate FROM economic_data WHERE unemployment_rate BETWEEN 3.0 AND 8.0;
SELECT decision_id, decision_description, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_description LIKE '%public%' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators ORDER BY indicator_name ASC
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 100
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value < 50
SELECT AVG(indicator_value) AS average_value FROM economic_indicators
SELECT * FROM job_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 100 ORDER BY indicator_name DESC
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM job_reports WHERE job_openings > job_applications
SELECT decision_description, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date ASC
SELECT MAX(indicator_value) AS max_value FROM economic_indicators
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_name FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_category = 'Employment';
SELECT report_date, report_description FROM economic_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_location, job_salary FROM job_market_data WHERE job_salary > 50000;
SELECT decision_description FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_impact = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_category FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_category = 'Finance';
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_name, indicator_description FROM economic_indicators ORDER BY indicator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision_impact = 'High';
SELECT job_title, job_salary FROM job_market_data WHERE job_salary > 50000;
SELECT job_title, job_location, salary FROM job_openings;
SELECT applicant_name, app_status, app_date FROM job_applications;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value, indicator_date FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT decision_title, decision_date, decision_description FROM policy_decisions;
SELECT report_title, report_date, report_content FROM economic_reports;
SELECT * FROM job_openings WHERE job_location = 'New York';
SELECT job_title, salary FROM job_openings ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM job_applications WHERE app_status = 'pending' AND job_id = 1001;
SELECT decision_title, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value, indicator_date FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 1000 ORDER BY indicator_date ASC;
